item.title: Modernize Xamarin.Forms to .NET MAUI with AWS Transform
item.description: AWS Transform is an agentic service that accelerates modernization, including .NET applications. With it, you can transform legacy .NET applications to modern cross-platform .NET. AWS Transform can port your Xamarin.Forms mobile applications to .NET Multi-platform App UI (MAUI). In this post, I’ll show you how to transform your Xamarin.Forms projects to modern .NET MAUI. Why […] Link to article: https://aws.amazon.com/blogs/dotnet/modernize-xamarin-forms-to-net-maui-with-aws-transform/
